name: Winged Wheels
shortDes: This is a full-stack website about Winged Wheels Manufacturer management website where bicycle parts that are stored and managed.

name: Perfume Pungent
shortDes: This is a full-stack website about Perfume Pungent Warehouse management website where multiple inventory items that are managed.

name: WildQuestLens
shortDes: WildQuestLens website is about wild photography which provides independent service.
des1: The Home page is consists of header section, banner section, services section, award section, image of the month section, and footer section.
des2: There are available 6 services for the wild photography. These are as follows environmental, portraits, nature, motion, shadows & light, and fire & ice.
des3: The Blog page contains three questions and their answers.The About page provides the information about the developer
des4: User can Create an Account and Signin via Firebase authentication. User can  also Signin via Google signin or Github signin.
des5: Users can book Environmental, Portraits, Nature, Motion, Shadows & Light, and Fire & Ice for photography.Clicking on the book now button it will take user to checkout.

name: Sunglass Sanctuary
shortDes: This project is about product reviews on the Sunglass Sanctuary website.
des1: The Home page is consists of header section and customer reviews. There are available 3 customer reviews on this page.
des2: The Reviews page has several reviews from the customer along with their image, review, and ratings.
des3: The Dashboard page has four different types of charts which are Line Chart, Area Chart, Bar chart, and Pie Chart. Those charts are made with recharts library and data were given from month-wise sell JSON-data.
des4: The Blogs page contains two question and their answers.
des5: This project also has about page.
